errors.error_description: Installation commands are in wrong order - installing dependencies before creating virtual environment
correction_candidates:
python -m venv venv
source venv/bin/activate
pip install -r requirements.txt

pip install virtualenv
python -m venv venv
source venv/bin/activate
pip install -r requirements.txt

python -m venv bitcart-env
source bitcart-env/bin/activate
pip install -r requirements.txt

conda create -n bitcart python=3.8
conda activate bitcart
pip install -r requirements.txt
errors.golden_answer:
python -m venv venv
source venv/bin/activate
pip install -r requirements.txt

errors.error_description: Incorrect repository URL for BitCCL project

https://github.com/bitcart/bitcart-scripts - The BitCCL scripting language for checkout flow automation

errors.golden_answer: https://github.com/bitcart/bitccl - The BitCCL scripting language for checkout flow automation
